name: Non-Stop Killing
description:
Mini Jam 86  Theme: Sports Limitation: No stopping

Kill enemies every 15 seconds. Each kill is replenished by the timer. How many can you kill?

Controlls:

LMB - fire.

S - speed down.

W - speed up.

P.S.

The music was written by me especially for this game.

Updates: V1

- Music

- Save high score

- Post processing

- Minor bag fixed
